attributes.action: Ban any politician from being a member of more than one parliament or assembly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there is no rule to stop any person from being a member of as many elected posts as they can be elected too - This leads to some politicians being not only an MP but an MEP and a member of a regional assemble - as such they can not possibly give their full attention to any individual post and in turn they cheat the electorate out of out rights to be properly represented. They then can also collecting multiple salaries and expenses from jobs that they can only do part time. This should be stopped and as in the case of One person One Vote there should be one person for each elected seat and not one person for as many seats as they can get
